# SolidJS Context Knowledge Base

> A structured alternative to a flat llms.txt file, optimized for AI agent discovery.

## Details
- Full Structured Index: [index.md](./index.md)
- Root Metadata: [STRUCTURE.md](./STRUCTURE.md)

## Domains
- Core Reactivity: [Index](./core-reactivity/index.json)
- Routing: [Index](./routing/index.json)
- SSR: [Index](./ssr/index.json)
- Primitives: [Index](./primitives/index.json)

## Usage
This documentation is organized into domains. AI agents should read the root index.md first to understand where specific primitives are located.
